website_summaries.verdict: This 1,070-piece set recreates the Monastery of Spinjitzu along with 8 different minifigures and 4 Golden Weapons.
pros: This is a new version of a popular set from the long-running TV show
The huge set is 11” long and 12” high
You can recreate any past battles from the show or create all-new ones from your imagination

customer_reviews.title: This is is amaaaazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my kids, they are 6 and 9 and they loved it. They got addicted specially my younger kid. Me and my wife played with them to complete and fine tune it. My kids like ninjago in general and those minifigures made their day! I have given 4 start because of the price tag. Highly recommended though
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Ahmed Yateem

customer_reviews.title: !! Disappointed !!  Received package with missing lego pieces
customer_reviews.text: It was my son’s surprise birthday gift which he wanted from long time. We gifted him on his birthday, he was so happy to see it. But he is so disappointed with it now because of missing lego pieces in packet number 8. He ended up crying a lot which made us very sad seeing him cry on his special day. Very very disappointed. I am not sure whom to contact for those missing pieces because of which the whole package is waste.
customer_reviews.author: Preeti

customer_reviews.title: Great value and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Ninjago, and really wanted this set. It comes with eight figures, which can sell for ten each, so it's a savings right there. It was such a cool set our autistic son was captivated and helped build and then played with her!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Lego set is great. But I gave a 4star because of the price. Too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this set. It comes with a lot of figures, and it was relatively easy to build. The final product was great, and all the pieces were included. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ann Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it but difficult to assemble and takes a lot of time to build.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's 8th birthday and upon opening was very excited. He is a big ninjago fan. He also loves spending time on lego projects. He did feel that it is very difficult to put together and takes a long time to put together. I would recommend this for maybe a very patient 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: James Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Ninjago fans in your life
customer_reviews.text: This set took a while to assemble (which is good)! It has a lot of minifigures, which my kids loved. The set features some cool action elements, like a flying golden chicken, windows that fly open, secret doors, and ninja training equipment. My kids love this and were occupied for many days setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Fun Set
customer_reviews.text: A fairly large Lego Kit. I purchased for my 6.5 year-old son - once the figures where assembled, it became my project to complete. Enjoyable build. A good number of figures to play with.
customer_reviews.author: John Sikking

customer_reviews.title: Son's most favorite Lego set
customer_reviews.text: My 9yr old Son loves this Lego set. This was his favorite set of all the sets he has so far. Would definitely recommend this for any Lego enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice build.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. Took a while to build, and they play with it now that’s it’s together.
customer_reviews.author: D354

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a birthday gift to my 8 year old grandson. He is safe at home during this pandemic, and this has given him hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool features, nice unique parts
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these on sale here and another one from Target for the same price. Pretty cool build, lots of cool little playable features.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!

customer_reviews.text: My grandson built this whole set in about an hour. However, when he got to the end none of the ninjago stickers to complete the set were there. He was disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Is it good or bad?
customer_reviews.text: It a perfect set because it does bring back scene you can do witb also modern ones today but the monostary doesn't have many space to put the minifigure in to interact but just for show and to hide the golden weapons. Aside from that it a pretty good set!

customer_reviews.title: Made a memorable gift for my grandson’s 8th birthday!!

product_meta.title: LEGO NINJAGO Legacy Monastery of Spinjitzu 70670 Battle Toy Building Kit includes Ninja Toy Weapons and Training Equipment for Creative Play (1,070 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Kids can prepare for ninja battles at the LEGO NINJAGO Legacy Monastery of Spinjitzu and stop Wyplash stealing a Golden Weapon. The ninja monastery opens out for easy play and features an opening gate, tea room with knife trap function. Plus, a rotating ninja training station, chicken trap function and NINJAGO history mural wall stickers. The NINJAGO minifigures can practice Spinjitzu in the courtyard with 2 handheld ninja minifigure battle platforms, a sword-spinning toy training station and ‘fruit-cutting’ training station. This action-packed ninja playset includes all 4 collectible Golden Weapons— The Sword of Fire, The Nunchucks of Lightning, The Scythe of Quakes and The Shurikens of Ice. Plus, this battle toy building kit includes 8 NINJAGO characters for kids to reimagine classic scenes from the NINJAGO Masters of Spinjitzu TV show or create their own adventures for hours of imaginative play.
feature_bullets: Kids can create the Monastery of Spinjitzu toy building with a tea room featuring a hidden knife and chicken trap functions, The NINJAGO minifigures can use the spinning toys at each training station to prepare for endless ninja battles

This ninja toy features 8 LEGO NINJAGO minifigures including Wu, Jay, Nya, Zane, Cole, Lloyd, Kai and Wyplash. Plus, all 4 Golden Weapons, The Sword of Fire, The Nunchucks of Lightning, The Scythe of Quakes and The Shurikens of Ice are included.

The LEGO NINJAGO Legacy Monastery of Spinjitzu action toy can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO building bricks for hours of imaginative play, This is a great ninja toy for kids to create their own adventures with!

The LEGO NINJAGO Legacy range features new versions of popular LEGO NINJAGO sets from past seasons to recreate or reimagine classic conflicts from the NINJAGO Masters of Spinjitzu TV show. This ninja build will compliment any building set.

This 1070-piece ninja playset measures over 11 inches (29cm) high, 12 inches (32cm) wide and 8 inches (21cm) deep when closed, It's the perfect ninja toy for boys and girls aged 9+ for imaginative play
